title: Valiate Metric summary sends out to GEF at every 5 min interval
custom_steps:
- Enable watson logging for smtpdem 5
- Review every 5 mins interval smtpdem tries to connect grpc to sen dout metric summary 
- This should even occur if all metrics are at zeroed value 
- Verify TCPdump to and/or GEF logs to verify metrics are received
custom_expected:
- Enable smtpdem logs successfully
- Wait for 5-10 mins for metrics send out in 5 min interval
- Ensure metric name shows correctly and metric count is incremented
- Verify TCPdump to and/or GEF logs to verify metrics are received
